title: The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives

sources.title: The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives (1933)
sources.description: The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives is a 1933 Christmas-themed Warner Bros. Merrie Melodies animated short film directed by Rudolf Ising. The short was released on January 7, 1933. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-shanty-where-santy-claus-lives-1933/

metadata.Plot: Christmas Eve. A poor orphan boy trudges through the snow, pathetically. He finally arrives at his miserable cabin. While he is crying, Santa arrives and, singing the title song, offers to take the boy to his workshop. They arrive, and the toys go wild (in the full version, they sing the title song, but this has been censored in some versions due to outdated stereotypes). He plays with a few toys. A candle falls off the tree and starts a fire. The toys try in vain to fight the fire; the boy hooks up a hose to a set of bagpipes and takes care of it.
metadata.Actors: Rudolf Ising, The King's Men, Johnny Murray
